metadata.dc:title: Pehrsson et al (2015) GPlates Reconstruction
metadata.dc:creator: Sally Pehrsson
metadata.dc:subject: empty
metadata.dc:description: This plate reconstruction describes the kinematic evolution of continental blocks during the assembly and breakup of the Proterozoic supercontinent Nuna.
metadata.dc:source: Pehrsson, S.J., Eglington, B.M., Evans, D.A.D., Huston, D. and Reddy, S.M., 2015. Metallogeny and its link to orogenic style during the Nuna supercontinent cycle. In: Li, Z.X., Evans, D. A. D. & Murphy, J. B. (eds) Supercontinent Cycles Through Earth History. Geological Society, London, Special Publications, v424
